question: {name} makes {drink} using teaspoons of sugar and cups of water in a ratio of {m}:{n}. She also uses {p} tablespoons of milk for every {nn} cups of water, and uses {pc} tablespoons of heavy cream for every teaspoon of sugar. She used a total of {x} teaspoons of sugar, cups of water, tablespoons of cream, and tablespoons of milk. How many teaspoons of sugar did she use?
